languages.text: {n}Ксеносы перед вами настороженно оглядываются, перекидываясь отрывистыми репликами, которые не может подхватить и разобрать ваш Толкователь. Наконец, один из друкари выступает вперед и снимает шлем. Его волосы — кипенно-белые, а лицо отмечено татуировками, схожими с теми, что исчерчивают лицо Маражая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксеносы перед вами настороженно оглядываются, перекидываясь отрывистыми репликами, которые не может подхватить и разобрать ваш Толкователь. Наконец, один из друкари выступает вперед и снимает свой шлем.{/n}
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}The xenos in front of you exchange wary glances and curt remarks that your Elucidator cannot capture or comprehend. At last, one of the Drukhari steps forward and takes off his helmet. His hair is bone-white and his face is marked with tattoos not entirely dissimilar to Marazhai's.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ксеносы перед вами настороженно оглядываются, перекидываясь отрывистыми репликами, которые не может подхватить и разобрать ваш Толкователь. Наконец, один из друкари выступает вперед и снимает шлем. Его волосы — кипенно-белые, а лицо отмечено татуировками, схожими с теми, что исчерчивают лицо Маражая.{/n}

His hair is bone-white and the face is marked with tattoos not entirely dissimilar to Marazhai's.{/n}
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Die Xenos vor dir tauschen misstrauische Blicke und knappe Bemerkungen aus, die dein Elucidator nicht erfassen oder verstehen kann. Schließlich tritt einer der Drukhari vor und nimmt seinen Helm ab. Seine Haare sind knochenweiß, sein Gesicht mit Tätowierungen versehen, die Marazhais ähneln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos in front of you exchange wary glances and curt remarks that your Elucidator cannot capture or comprehend. At last, one of the Drukhari steps forward and takes off his helmet. His hair is bone-white and his face is marked with tattoos not entirely dissimilar to Marazhai's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Xenos vor dir tauschen misstrauische Blicke und knappe Bemerkungen aus, die dein Elucidator nicht erfassen oder verstehen kann. Schließlich tritt einer der Drukhari vor und nimmt seinen Helm ab. Seine Haare sind knochenweiß, sein Gesicht mit Tätowierungen versehen, die Marazhais ähneln.{/n}
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}你面前的异形交换着警惕的目光与简短的话语，你的阐释器无法翻译这些人的窃窃私语。最后，一名黑暗灵族走上前来，摘下了头盔。他的头发雪白，脸上带着刺青，和玛拉斋的刺青有几分相似之处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos in front of you exchange wary glances and curt remarks that your Elucidator cannot capture or comprehend. At last, one of the Drukhari steps forward and takes off his helmet. His hair is bone-white and his face is marked with tattoos not entirely dissimilar to Marazhai's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前的异形交换着警惕的目光与简短的话语，你的阐释器无法翻译这些人的窃窃私语。最后，一名黑暗灵族走上前来，摘下了头盔。他的头发雪白，脸上带着刺青，和玛拉斋的刺青有几分相似之处。{/n}
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Les xénos en face de vous échangent des regards méfiants et des remarques froides que votre élucidateur ne parvient ni à capter ni à comprendre. Au bout d'un moment, l'un des Drukharis s'avance et retire son casque. Sa chevelure blanc d'os encadre un visage gravé de tatouages similaires à ceux de Marazhai.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos in front of you exchange wary glances and curt remarks that your Elucidator cannot capture or comprehend. At last, one of the Drukhari steps forward and takes off his helmet. His hair is bone-white and his face is marked with tattoos not entirely dissimilar to Marazhai's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les xénos en face de vous échangent des regards méfiants et des remarques froides que votre élucidateur ne parvient ni à capter ni à comprendre. Au bout d'un moment, l'un des Drukharis s'avance et retire son casque. Sa chevelure blanc d'os encadre un visage gravé de tatouages similaires à ceux de Marazhai.{/n}
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Los xenos que tienes delante intercambian miradas cautelosas y breves comentarios que tu Dilucidador no alcanza a captar ni comprender. Por fin, uno de los Drukhari da un paso al frente y se quita el casco. Su pelo es blanco como un hueso y su cara está marcada por tatuajes similares a los de Marazhai.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos in front of you exchange wary glances and curt remarks that your Elucidator cannot capture or comprehend. At last, one of the Drukhari steps forward and takes off his helmet. His hair is bone-white and his face is marked with tattoos not entirely dissimilar to Marazhai's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los xenos que tienes delante intercambian miradas cautelosas y breves comentarios que tu Dilucidador no alcanza a captar ni comprender. Por fin, uno de los Drukhari da un paso al frente y se quita el casco. Su pelo es blanco como un hueso y su cara está marcada por tatuajes similares a los de Marazhai.{/n}
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}目の前にいる異種族は、油断のない面持ちでエルシデイターが理解することのできない言葉をぶっきらぼうに交わす。ついにデュカーリの一人が前に出てヘルメットを脱いだ。髪は骨のように白く、顔にはマラズハイのものとよく似たタトゥーが刻まれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos in front of you exchange wary glances and curt remarks that your Elucidator cannot capture or comprehend. At last, one of the Drukhari steps forward and takes off his helmet. His hair is bone-white and his face is marked with tattoos not entirely dissimilar to Marazhai's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前にいる異種族は、油断のない面持ちでエルシデイターが理解することのできない言葉をぶっきらぼうに交わす。ついにデュカーリの一人が前に出てヘルメットを脱いだ。髪は骨のように白く、顔にはマラズハイのものとよく似たタトゥーが刻まれている。{/n}
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Önündeki zenolar, çevreye temkinli bakışlar atıyor ve Aydınlatıcı'nın yakalayamadığı veya anlamlandıramadığı kısa yorumlarda bulunuyorlar. Nihayet Drukharilerden biri ileri çıkıp kaskını çıkarıyor. Saçı kemik beyazı, yüzü ise Marazhai'ınkilerden çok da farklı olmayan dövmelerle kaplı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos in front of you exchange wary glances and curt remarks that your Elucidator cannot capture or comprehend. At last, one of the Drukhari steps forward and takes off his helmet. His hair is bone-white and his face is marked with tattoos not entirely dissimilar to Marazhai's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Önündeki zenolar çevreye temkinli bakışlar atıyor ve Aydınlatıcı'nın yakalayamadığı veya anlamlandıramadığı kısa yorumlarda bulunuyorlar. Nihayet Drukharilerden biri ileri çıkıyor ve kaskını çıkarıyor. Saçı kemik beyazı ve yüzü Marazhai'ınkilerden çok da farklı olmayan dövmelerle kaplı.{/n}
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
